info.name: My Light Blue v1
info.additionalInfo:
I had to declare a <tt>@-moz-document</tt> scope for an specific domain cause Stylish server wouldn't let me publish a global theme. If you want to enjoy the full potential of this theme comment the line <tt>@-moz-document domain(google.com) {</tt> and the closing bracket in the last line of the code. I'm sorry for leaving the theme this way but I have no intention to spend much time working on it.

This theme works on Github, Whatsapp, Lichess, Google Search, Youtube, and potentially lots of other sites using the same css class naming covered here.

If you enjoy this theme drop me a line via email, you can find the address in the first lines of the code.
